pages.text: $(li)The Witch Pupil is a mysterious item that holds corrupted magic in its interior.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Witch Eye$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)This item can rarely be found inside of the $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_tower)Witch Tower$(/l), $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_house)Witch Hut$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_tower)Maple Witch Hut$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) may drop their pupil on death too.
